fields.name: Make Bottle:
fields.value: Make a bottle, giving the head role one bottle

fields.name: Weaken:
fields.value: Weaken the player you use this on, giving them a significant host decided debuff(1 use)

fields.name: Harming:
fields.value: Attack the player you use this on(1 use)

fields.name: Healing:
fields.value:
Give the player you use this on powerful defense(1 use)

Attributes-
-If you die, give the head role two bottles.
-You may target faction members
